name: MICRO TROOPER
description:
What it is?

Micro Trooper is a tiny action platformer inspired by classics like Super Crate Box and Downwell.

How you play it

Your goal is to kill as many mini bosses as possible. Each miniboss will spawn when you pickup the crystal. More crystals you have, tougher the boss will be.

Controls

  • Z or Y - JUMP
  • X - FIRE
  • ARROWS - MOVE

The game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #40.
